name: BlockBuilder
description:
----------------- BuildClassicGame -----------------------------

BlockBuilder game 

How to install:

Download this game on itch.io and download it

after sucessfully download, click on BlockBuilder.zip

if you use WinRAR is click on Extract To

after sucessfully extract, is click on BlockBuilder folder

search and click on BLOCK BUILDER Classic.exe

Enjoy in the game

------------------- System Requirement-------------------

OS: Windows XP or newer

Processer: 223 MHz

Memory 64 MB

DirectX Version: 6 or Newer.
